author: Katherine Rodriguez, Katherine Rodriguez
title: Illinois Mayor Who Sent Cops to Break Up Banned Party Finds Wife There
description: An Illinois mayor who sent the police to crack down on parties of more than ten people during the coronavirus pandemic found his wife at one of those parties.
content:
An Illinois mayor who sent the police to crack down on parties of more than ten people during the coronavirus pandemic found his wife at one of those parties.
Brant Walker, mayor of Alton, ordered the police to crack down on anyone who violated Gov. J.B. Pri… [+1037 chars]
